headline.main: Christian and Nazi; THE WAR AGAINST GOD. Edited by Carl Carmer. 261 pp. New York: Henry Holt & Co. $2.75.

lead_paragraph: MR. CARMER, who is a devoted Christian layman, has made a compilation in this book of significant Nazi statements on religion and Christianity and of answers to this challenge inside Germany and the democratic world. The Nazi anthology is very brief, rather too brief.
